original: 2 Khandhayamaka
analyzed: khandha yamaka

original: 2.2 Pavattivāra
2.2.3. Uppādanirodhavāra
2.2.3.1 Paccuppannavāra
2.2.3.1.1. Anulomapuggala
analyzed: anuloma puggala

original: Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa rūpa kkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanā kkhandho nirujjhati iti no

original: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa vā pana vedanā kkhandhaḥ nirujjhati tassa rūpa kkhandho uppajjati iti no

original: Yassa vedanākkhandho uppajjati tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa vedanā khandho uppajjati tassa saññā khandho nirujjhati iti no

original: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa vā pana saññā kkhandho nirujjhati tassa vedanā kkhandho uppajjati iti no

original: 2.2.3.1.2. Anulomaokāsa
analyzed: anuloma okāsa

original: Yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?
analyzed: yattha rūpa kkhandhaḥ uppajjati tattha vedanā kkhandhaḥ nirujjhati iti

original: Asaññasatte tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati, no ca tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati. Pañcavokāre tattha rūpakkhandho ca uppajjati vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati.
analyzed: asaññasatte tattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjati no ca tattha vedanā kkhandho nirujjhati pañcavokāre tattha rūpa kkhandho ca uppajjati vedanā kkhandho ca nirujjhati

original: Yattha vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti?
analyzed: yattha vā pana vedanā kkhandhaḥ nirujjhati tattha rūpa kkhandhaḥ uppajjati iti

original: Arūpe tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati. Pañcavokāre tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhati rūpakkhandho ca uppajjati.
analyzed: arūpe tattha vedanā kkhandho nirujjhati no ca tattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjati pañcavokāre tattha vedanā kkhandho ca nirujjhati rūpa kkhandho ca uppajjati

original: Yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjati tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yattha vedanā kkhandhaḥ uppajjati tattha saññā kkhandhaḥ nirujjhati iti āmantā

original: Yattha vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhati tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yattha vā pana saññā kkhandhaḥ nirujjhati tattha vedanā kkhandho uppajjati iti āmantā

original: 2.2.3.1.3. Anulomapuggalokāsa
analyzed: anuloma puggala ukāsa

original: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjati tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho nirujjhati iti no

original: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha vedanā kkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjati iti no

original: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjati tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa yattha vedanā kkhandho uppajjati tassa tattha saññā kkhandho nirujjhati iti no

original: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjatīti? No.
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha saññā kkhandho nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho uppajjati iti no

original: 2.2.3.1.4. Paccanīkapuggala
analyzed: paccanīka puggala

original: Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
analyzed: yassa rūpa kkhandho na uppajjati tassa vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhati iti

original: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho
analyzed: catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānam tesam rūpa kkhandho nuppajjati no ca tesam vedanā kkhandho

original: na nirujjhati. Arūpaṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca
analyzed: na nirujjhati arūpam upapajjantānam asaññasattā cavantānam tesam rūpa kkhandho ca

original: nuppajjati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
analyzed: na uppajjati vedanā khandhaḥ ca na nirujjhati

original: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhati tassa rūpa kkhandho nuppajjati iti

original: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati,
analyzed: pañcavokāram upapajjantānam asaññasattam upapajjantānam tesam vedanā khandhaḥ na nirujjhati

original: no ca tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nuppajjati. Arūpaṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ
analyzed: no ca tesam rūpa kkhandho nuppajjati arūpam upapajjantānam asaññasattā cavantānam

original: tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati.
analyzed: tesam vedanā kkhandhaḥ ca na nirujjhati rūpa kkhandhaḥ ca nuppajjati

original: Yassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjati tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
analyzed: yassa vedanā kkhandho na uppajjati tassa saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati iti

original: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ saññākkhandho
analyzed: catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānam tesam vedanā khandho nuppajjati no ca tesam saññā khandho

original: na nirujjhati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
analyzed: na nirujjhati asaññasattānam tesam vedanā kkhandho ca nuppajjati saññā kkhandho ca na nirujjhati

original: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati tassa vedanā kkhandho nuppajjati iti

original: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ saññākkhandho na nirujjhati, no ca
analyzed: catuvokāram pañcavokāram upapajjantānam tesam saññā khandho na nirujjhati no ca

original: tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nuppajjati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhati
analyzed: tesam vedanā khandho nuppajjati asaññasattānam tesam saññā khandho ca na nirujjhati

original: vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati.
analyzed: vedanā khandhaḥ ca nuppajjati

original: 2.2.3.1.5. Paccanīkaokāsa
analyzed: paccanīka okāsa

original: Yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
analyzed: yattha rūpa kkhandhaḥ na uppajjati tattha vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhati iti nirujjhati

original: Yattha vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti? Uppajjati.
analyzed: yattha vā pana vedanā kkhandhaḥ na nirujjhati tattha rūpa kkhandhaḥ nu pajjati iti uppajjati

original: Yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yattha vedanā kkhandho na uppajjati tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati iti āmantā

original: Yattha vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhati tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yattha vā pana saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati tattha vedanā kkhandho nuppajjati iti āmantā

original: 2.2.3.1.6. Paccanīkapuggalokāsa
analyzed: paccanīka puggala okāsa

original: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa kkhandho na uppajjati tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhati iti

original: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānam tesam tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati no ca tesam

original: tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati. Arūpaṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ
analyzed: tattha vedanā khandho na nirujjhati arūpam upapajjantānam asaññasattā cavantānam

original: tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
analyzed: tesam tattha rūpa kkhandho ca nuppajjati vedanā kkhandho ca na nirujjhati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha rūpa kkhandho nuppajjati iti

original: Pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
analyzed: pañcavokāram upapajjantānam asaññasattam upapajjantānam tesam tattha vedanā khandho

original: na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati. Arūpaṁ upapajjantānaṁ
analyzed: na nirujjhati no ca tesam tattha rūpa kkhandho nuppajjati arūpam

original: asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati.
analyzed: asaññasattā cavantānam tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho ca na nirujjhati rūpa kkhandho ca nuppajjati

original: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha vedanā kkhandho na uppajjati tassa tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati iti

original: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānam tesam tattha vedanā khandho nuppajjati no ca tesam

original: tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca
analyzed: tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati asaññasattānam tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho ca

original: nuppajjati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhati.
analyzed: na uppajjati saññā kkhandho ca na nirujjhati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho nuppajjati iti

original: Catuvokāraṁ pañcavokāraṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhati,
analyzed: catuvokāram pañcavokāram upapajjantānam tesam tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhati

original: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati. Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha vedanā khandho nuppajjati asaññasattānam tesam tattha saññā khandho

original: ca na nirujjhati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati.
analyzed: ca na nirujjhati vedanā khandhaḥ ca nuppajjati

analyzed: atītavāra

original: 2.2.3.6.3. Anulomapuggalokāsa
analyzed: anuloma puggala ukāsa

original: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho nirujjhissati iti

original: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha,
analyzed: pañcavokāre parinibbantānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha

original: no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha vedanā khandho nirujjhissati itaresam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha

original: rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
analyzed: rūpa kkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanā kkhandho ca nirujjhissati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha vedanā kkhandhaḥ nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjittha ati

original: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no
analyzed: suddhāvāsam upapajjantānam arūpānam tesam tattha vedanā khandho nirujjhissati no

original: ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha. Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
analyzed: ca tesam tattha rūpa kkhandho uppajjittha itaresam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho

original: ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha.
analyzed: ca nirujjhissati rūpa khandhaḥ ca uppajjittha

original: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha vedanā kkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha saññā kkhandho nirujjhissati iti

original: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho
analyzed: parinibbantānam tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho uppajjittha no ca tesam tattha saññā kkhandho

original: nirujjhissati. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
analyzed: nirujjhissati itaresam catuvokārānam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha vedanā khandho

original: ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
analyzed: ca uppajjittha saññā kkhandho ca nirujjhissati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha saññā kkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho uppajjittha ati

original: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: suddhāvāsam upapajjantānam tesam tattha saññā kkhandho nirujjhissati no ca tesam

original: tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha. Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: tattha vedanā khandho uppajjittha itaresam catuvokārānam pañcavokārānam tesam tattha

original: saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha.
analyzed: saññā kkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanā kkhandho ca uppajjittha

original: 2.2.3.6.4. Paccanīkapuggala
analyzed: paccanīka puggala

original: Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
analyzed: yassa rūpa kkhandhaḥ nuppajjittha tassa vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhissati iti natthi

original: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
analyzed: yassa vā pana vedanā kkhandhaḥ na nirujjhissati tassa rūpa kkhandho nuppajjittha ati uppajjittha

original: Yassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
analyzed: yassa vedanā kkhandho na uppajjittha tassa saññā kkhandho na nirujjhissati iti natthi

original: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
analyzed: yassa vā pana saññā kkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanā kkhandho nuppajjittha ati uppajjittha

original: 2.2.3.6.5. Paccanīkaokāsa
analyzed: paccanīka okāsa

original: Yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha …pe….
analyzed: yattha rūpakkhandhaḥ nuppajjittha pe

original: 2.2.3.6.6. Paccanīkapuggalokāsa
analyzed: paccanīka puggala okāsa

original: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha rūpa kkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhissati iti

original: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca
analyzed: suddhāvāsam upapajjantānam arūpānam tesam tattha rūpa kkhandho nuppajjittha no ca

original: tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ
analyzed: tesam tattha vedanā khandho na nirujjhissati suddhāvāse parinibbantānam arūpe parinibbantānam

original: tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
analyzed: tesam tattha rūpa kkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanā kkhandho ca na nirujjhissati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha vedanā kkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpa kkhandho nuppajjittha ati

original: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati,
analyzed: pañcavokāre parinibbantānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha vedanā khandho na nirujjhissati

original: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha rūpa khandho nuppajjittha suddhāvāse parinibbantānam arūpe parinibbantānam

original: tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpa kkhandho ca nuppajjittha

original: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha vedanā kkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhissati iti

original: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ
analyzed: suddhāvāsam upapajjantānam tesam tattha vedanā khandho nuppajjittha no ca tesam

original: tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ
analyzed: tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhissati suddhāvāse parinibbantānam asaññasattānam

original: tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
analyzed: tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho ca nuppajjittha saññā kkhandho ca na nirujjhissati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanā kkhandho nuppajjittha ati

original: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho
analyzed: parinibbantānam tesam tattha saññā kkhandho na nirujjhissati no ca tesam tattha vedanā kkhandho

original: nuppajjittha. Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho
analyzed: nuppajjittha suddhāvāse parinibbantānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha saññā kkhandho

original: ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: ca na nirujjhissati vedanā khandhaḥ ca nuppajjittha

original: Uppādanirodhavāro.
analyzed: uppāda nirodha vāraḥ

original: Pavattivāro niṭṭhito.
analyzed: pavatti vāraḥ niṭṭhito
